title: "Readers Speak: Artificial intelligence need not be feared yet"
excerpt: "Recently, the media has been abuzz with the growth of Artificial Intelligence, stirring curiosity, excitement and perhaps a touch of apprehension. As these terms get thrown around, mingled with phrases like “machine learning” and “automation,” it’s no wonder that confusion and even fear can creep in."
